concept.title: Bluetooth Manager Overview
concept.shortdesc: The Bluetooth Manager component provides non-volatile storage of details of Bluetooth devices in the Bluetooth Registry.

section.title: Purpose
section.p: The Bluetooth Manager enables you to store details of devices in the Bluetooth Registry. It also enables you to retrieve, modify and delete the information about devices.

section.title: Key concepts and terms
section.p: Documentation on the Bluetooth Manager component uses the following key concepts and terms:

dd.p: Stored data that can be used by the UI whenever it is needed.
Information that is supplied by the host and transmitted in the inquiry responses sub-state.
Details of peer devices with which a device has formed secure relationships in the past.
Details of when devices were last connected.

section.title: Bluetooth Manager summary
section.p: The Bluetooth Manager component provides the following:

li.p: Provides a mechanism for discovering, setting and retreiving information about the various properties of a Bluetooth device.
Provides access to the Bluetooth Manager server.
Provides access to the Bluetooth Registry.
Provides ways of publishing information over the Bluetooth EIR mechanism.
